rukus.text: Did they not travel in the earth and see how the end of those before them was ( brought about )? They were severer than them in strength and ( in constructing ) memorials in the earth, but God caught them for their sins, and there was no one to guard them from God
That was because, their messengers had come to them with clear proofs but they rejected ( them) so God caught them, He is certainly Strong, Severe in requital
And We had sent Moses with Our signs and a clear authority
to Pharaoh and Haman and Korah, but they said, “( He is a ) magician, a liar.”
So when he came to them with the truth from Us, they said, “Kill the sons of those who believe with him and leave their women alive.” And the plot of the disbelievers ( ends ) in nothing but error
And Pharaoh said, “Leave me to kill Moses and let him call his Lord, I fear that he will change your religion or he will make corruption to appear in the earth.”
And Moses said, “I seek the protection of my Lord and your Lord from every proud person who does not believe in the day of account.”
